comments:
Using the 5/14 IB and a clean workspace, I tried to open the launch 
configuration dialog via the Run > Run... context menu. When nothing happened, 
I went to the Debug perspective and tried using the Run... menu item. Once 
again, nothing happened. The following errors were in the .log.

When I restarted the IDE, I could get to the launch configuration dialog ok.
